title: Let Me Call You Sweetheart
lyrics: Keep those love lights burning In your eyes of blue.
Don't you call me sweetheart, I don't love you anymore.
Since I caught you smoochin' With the girl next door.
I saw you bend and kiss her
Gaze into her eyes of blue.
Don't you call me sweetheart, 'Cause I don't love you!
I'm in love with your automobile. Let me hear you whisper that You'll pay the gasoline bill.
Keep those headlights burning And your hands upon the wheel. Let me call you sweetheart,
I'm in love with your automobile!
